item.title: BBCの委員会は、リチャード・シャープの会長在任中の利益相反の可能性を排除したが、最初に「宣言」を行うべきだったと述べている（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
A BBC committee clears Richard Sharp of potential conflicts of interest during his tenure as chairman but says he should have made “declarations” at the outset  —  The BBC has cleared the resigning Richard Sharp of any potential conflict of interest issues arising during his time as Chairman.

item.title: The Athleticのライター主催のライブルームの様子。ビートレポーターが試合後に購読者と会話するための双方向プラットフォームとして機能している（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
A look at The Athletic's writer-hosted live rooms, which serve as a two-way platform for beat reporters to have postgame conversations with subscribers  —  The Athletic's first live room took place in September 2021.  By January 2022, they'd done 100.  Today, they're closing in on 1,000.

item.title: ITV、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比7%減の£776M、ITV Studiosの売上高は横ばいの£457M、総広告収入は前年同期比10%減、デジタル広告収入は同30%増の£87M (Naman Ramachandran/Variety)
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
ITV reports Q1 revenue down 7% YoY to £776M, ITV Studios revenue flat at £457M, total ad revenue down 10% YoY, and digital ad revenue up 30% YoY to £87M  —  U.K. broadcasting giant ITV's revenues dipped in the first quarter of 2023, but streamer ITVX has seen a growth uptick, according to figures released on Thursday.

item.title: 欧州メディアグループMediahuisがブリュッセルのEUニュースサイトEuractivを買収、「欧州のメディアチャンピオンの1つ」を目指す（Mathieu Pollet/Politico)
item.description:
Mathieu Pollet / Politico:
European media group Mediahuis acquires Brussels-based EU news website Euractiv, seeking to become “one of Europe's media champions”  —  Mediahuis owns numerous newspapers across Europe.  —  European media group Mediahuis has acquired the Brussels-based EU news website Euractiv, the two organizations announced Thursday.

item.title: 2017年から黒字化し、2023年の売上が$10Mを超える予定のDonald AlbrightとPayne Lindseyのポッドキャストとマルチメディア企業Tenderfoot TVの様子（Reggie Ugwu/New York Times）
item.description:
Reggie Ugwu / New York Times:
A look at Tenderfoot TV, Donald Albright and Payne Lindsey's podcast and multimedia company that is profitable since 2017 and set to exceed $10M in 2023 revenue  —  Tenderfoot TV, the studio behind “High Strange,” is leaning in while others pull back.  —  The biggest flex in “High Strange …

item.title: 中絶の権利を終了させるSCOTUSの意見書の草案を掲載したPoliticoがなぜピューリッツァー賞を受賞しなかったのか、ジャーナリストたちは疑問を呈し、不具合を疑う者もいる（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
Journalists question why Politico didn't win a Pulitzer Prize for publishing the draft SCOTUS opinion ending the right to an abortion; some suspect a glitch  —  Journalists have been buzzing since Monday's stunner, and even trading theories.  A computer glitch?  Wrong category?

item.title: WGAの脚本家ストライキは、いくつかの番組の制作を完全に停止したり、脚本家ルームを閉鎖したり、既存の契約を中断したりと、制作を混乱させている（Ananya Bhattacharya/Quartz）。
item.description:
Ananya Bhattacharya / Quartz:
The WGA writers' strike is disrupting productions, stopping the production of some shows completely, closing writers' rooms, suspending existing deals, and more  —  Netflix's Stranger Things, Marvel's Blade, AppleTV+'s Severance, and more  —  The impact of Hollywood's ongoing writers' strike …

item.title: CNNのタウンホールで、ドナルド・トランプは2020年の選挙が不正に行われたという嘘を繰り返し、E・ジーン・キャロルを馬鹿にし、司会のケイトラン・コリンズを「嫌な人」と呼んだ（Washington Post）
item.description:
Washington Post:
In CNN's town hall, Donald Trump repeated lies that the 2020 election was rigged, mocked E. Jean Carroll, and called moderator Kaitlan Collins “a nasty person”  —  The former president condones violence on Jan. 6, 2021 and a government default in a televised appearance

item.title: フェニックス・サンズがDiamond SportsのRSNを離れ、Gray TelevisionとDTCストリーミングサービスKisweでレギュラーシーズンのNBAゲームを放映するという契約を破産判事が停止した（Lillian Rizzo/CNBC）
item.description:
Lillian Rizzo / CNBC:
A bankruptcy judge halts the Phoenix Suns' deal to leave Diamond Sports' RSN and air regular season NBA games on Gray Television and DTC streaming service Kiswe  —  - A bankruptcy judge Wednesday halted the Phoenix Suns' deal that would have seen its games leave bankrupt Diamond Sports' regional sports network.

item.title: Netflixの共同CEOであるTed Sarandosは、作家のストライキの中、組織の活動を邪魔したくないと、来週のPEN Americaのガラを辞退する（Matt Donnelly/Variety)
item.description:
Matt Donnelly / Variety:
Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos pulls out of next week's PEN America gala, saying he didn't want to distract from the organization's work, amid the writers' strike  —  Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos will no longer attend a gala meant to honor him next week in New York.  The decision comes as labor issues grab headlines across Hollywood.

item.title: Fox Newsがまた名誉毀損で訴えられる、ロシアの偽情報とオンラインハラスメントの専門家で元米国DHS幹部であるNina Jankowiczから（New York Times)
item.description:
New York Times:
Fox News gets hit with another defamation lawsuit, from Nina Jankowicz, a Russian disinformation and online harassment specialist and a former US DHS executive  —  The suit, brought by a specialist in Russian disinformation, cites parallels with the recently settled Dominion Voting Systems case against Fox.

item.title: ディズニーのボブ・アイガーCEOは、2023年末までにDisney+にHuluのコンテンツを追加する予定であり、ESPN+を含む自社プラットフォームのスタンドアロンオプションは残ると述べている（Lillian Rizzo/CNBC）
item.description:
Lillian Rizzo / CNBC:
Disney CEO Bob Iger says the company plans to add Hulu content to Disney+ by the end of 2023; standalone options for its platforms, including ESPN+, will remain  —  - Disney+ will add content from Hulu to create a “one-app experience,” Disney CEO Bob Iger said.

item.title: YouTubeは、広告ブロッカーを利用しているユーザーに対して、YouTubeの広告を許可するか、Premiumへの加入を検討するよう促すポップアップを表示する「小さな実験」を全世界で実施している（Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
item.description:
Sergiu Gatlan / BleepingComputer:
YouTube is running a “small experiment” globally that shows a pop-up urging users with ad blockers to allow ads on YouTube or consider subscribing to Premium  —  YouTube is running an experiment asking some users to disable their ad blockers or pay for a premium subscription, or they will not be allowed to watch videos.

item.title: ディズニー第2四半期：売上高は前年同期比13%増の$21.82B、予想$21.78B、Disney+加入者数は前四半期比2%減の157.8M、予想163.17M、2四半期連続減少 (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Disney Q2: revenue up 13% YoY to $21.82B, vs. $21.78B est., and Disney+ subscribers down 2% QoQ to 157.8M, vs. 163.17M est., its second straight quarterly drop  —  On the bright side, the Mouse House also managed to narrow its streaming business losses by $400 million, down 26% year over year.

item.title: 親の苦労やうつ病やアルコール依存症との闘いを綴った「ママブロガー」の先駆者、ドゥースことヘザー・アームストロングが47歳で死去（Leanne Italie/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Leanne Italie / Associated Press:
Heather Armstrong, a pioneering “mommy blogger” known as Dooce who wrote about her parental struggles and her battles with depression and alcoholism, dies at 47  —  The pioneering mommy blogger Heather Armstrong, who laid bare her struggles as a mother and her battles with depression …
